title: Medical Director

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, you may reveal yourself as the Medical Director.
- At night, while revealed, you may select a player to become your Assistant, healing them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When selecting Assistants, you may not choose players who have been your Assistant before. This resets once there are no longer any viable targets to become your Assistant.
- While revealed, any attacks you receive are redirected to your Assistant.
- You learn how many attacks your Assistant received.
- If your Assistant is evil, no attacks are redirected to them.
- __*Part of the Town Power Variety Pack*__
